        public void setEnemys(int choseGuard,
                      int numberOgres)
        Sets the guard personality and the number of ogres in the game
        Parameters:
        choseGuard - - index of the guard (0 - Rookie, 1 - Drunken, 2 - Suspicious)
        numberOgres - - number of ogres in the keep level

      • playTurn

        public java.lang.String playTurn(char playerInput)
        Moves all the characters, checks if the hero is alive, checks if the level was completed
        Parameters:
        playerInput - - char that represent the moving direction of the hero, established by the user
        Returns:
        - return a String that describes the state of the game: "normal", "next level", "winner", "looser"
